On.Send: AnimBracketStart Visor Morph,Start Morph,Stand Morph,End Instant
AnimBracketStart BSD Birth Stand Death ContentPlayOnce

On.Terms: AbilMorph.*.Start; MorphFrom OrbitalCommand; MorphTo OrbitalCommandFlying; ScopeContains GroundLocalSelection
AbilMorph.*.Start; MorphFrom OrbitalCommandFlying; MorphTo OrbitalCommand; ScopeContains FlyerHelperSplat; HasStatus FlyerHelper
AbilMorph.*.Finish; MorphFrom OrbitalCommandFlying; MorphTo OrbitalCommand; PlayerHasClanDecal
AbilMorph.*.Finish; MorphFrom OrbitalCommandFlying; MorphTo OrbitalCommand; PlayerHasTrophy

On.Send: AnimBracketStart BSD Birth Stand Death ContentPlayOnce

On.Terms: AbilMorph.*.Start; MorphFrom Starport; MorphTo StarportFlying; ScopeContains GroundLocalSelection
AbilMorph.*.Start; MorphFrom StarportFlying; MorphTo Starport; ScopeContains FlyerHelperSplat; HasStatus FlyerHelper

On.Send: AnimBracketStart Visor Morph,Start Morph,Stand Morph,End Instant

On.Terms: TimerExpired; TimerName Shadow; IsStatus ShadowCreate 1; !Option Model Low

On.Send: AnimBracketStart Burrow Burrow IGNORE Unburrow ClosingFull,OpeningPlayForever,Instant
AnimBracketStart Root Stand,Work,Start Stand,Work Stand,Work,End ClosingFull,Instant
AnimBracketStart Root Stand,Work,Start Stand,Work Stand,Work,End ClosingFull,OpeningPlayForever
